CustomField.description: Defines if email notifications will be sent to Timesheet / Expense Claim Approvers. It works in conjunction with the 2 sets of Approval Email - New Token and Approval Email - Submit fields. If FALSE, all these fields are overridden and no emails are sent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines if email notifications will be sent to Timesheet / Expense Claim Approvers. It works in conjunction with the 2 sets of Approval Email - New Token and Approval Email - Submit fields. If FALSE, all these fields are overridden and no emails are sent.
CustomField.label: Send Email To Approver
